ygData.subject: Damage
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi im level 23 now which means, correct me if I am wrong, plus 4 to damage. So my damage now should be 2xbase+5. I have never seen my damage go above 11 (I use
ygData.messageBody:
Hi im level 23 now which means, correct me if I am wrong, plus 4 to damage.
So my damage now should be 2xbase+5.

I have never seen my damage go above 11 (I use scims with a base damage of
5). I consistently get in the 8 to 10 range with the odd 11. I still even
get one every now and then against whites.

What am I missing? According to 2xbase+1 formula my range should be 2 to
11, at level 23 my range should be 6 to 16. What am I missing? My natural
str is 75 but with items I got it to 91.

A frustrated,

Jaade D'Vinn
Indigo Sista Soldier
